name: tspersistentpriorityqueue
description: Perisistent Priority Queue implemented with Pairing Heaps for TS
author: iskolbin

scripts.test: ./node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc --experimentalDecorators -lib es5,es2015.iterable -t es5 test.ts && ./node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter html --reporter text ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test.js
